extension_description.message: Native video player for videos or livestreams in DASH (mpd), HLS (m3u8) format and M3U list.

settings_options_active_title.message:
Open .mpd, .m3u8 or m3u links automatically
in the video player when clicked

settings_options_lowlatency_title.message:
Enable automatic low latency stream detection.

It can be disabled if there are buffering issues.

settings_options_defaultaudio_title.message:
Default language of audio tracks.

It only works on videos with properly configured audio languages.

settings_license_widevine_title.message: Force a custom Widevine license server.

settings_license_clearkey_title.message: Force a list of custom ClearKeys.

settings_license_clearkey_error_key.message: The KeyID ${key} has an invalid key.

settings_help.message: If you have questions about how to use and configure the extension you can read the Wiki
